ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rhmf.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | rhmf.c | |- C = ( Base ` S ) |
| 3 |  | #P_rhmghm | |- ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) -> F e. ( R GrpHom S ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_ghmf | |- ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) -> F : B --> C ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) -> F : B --> C ) |
